Title: TOER Store
Summary: E-commerce app integrated with Stripe and Auth0
Description: Single-page React app utilizing Google Cloud PaaS for hosting Postgres database
Containerized via Docker utilizing Nginx for multi-stage build
Responsive web design with dark mode feature
React Context for complex state management
Node/Express backend utilizes RESTful APIs
Deployed on Google Cloud using Nginx as reverse-proxy

Title: Trackstar
Description: Single-page React app utilizing AWS RDS cloud PaaS for hosting Postgres database
RESTful APIs facilitate CRUD for watchlist/user management
Containerized via Docker utilizing Nginx for multi-stage build
Redux Thunk for complex state management
Node/Express backend
Responsive web design
Deployed via AWS EC2 using Nginx as reverse-proxy

Title: FFGenie
Description: Pulls all fantasy football teams for any Sleeper username and provides information about the stadium, weather, and betting odds for each player
Deployed with CI/CD pipeline via GitHub Actions
Unit, Integration, Async, Mock/Spy testing
Single page Vue app utilizing Typescript
Vuex for complex state management
Containerized via Docker
Responsive web design
